parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.85

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds given set of compiled instructions to the current stack and waits for it to finish and return, provides an option to pass arguments to the executed [[Code]].
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> See also [[Scheduler]].</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command accepts [[String]] (as well as [[Code]]) only in <template><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofp</value></part><part><name>link</name>=<value>y</value></part></template>. For later titles, see [[compile]].</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[call]] code

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> code: [[Code]] - [[compile]]d instructions

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Anything]] - The last value given in the function is returned. See the topic [[Function#Return_Values|Function]] for more information.

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> args [[call]] code

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> args: [[Anything]] -  Arguments that are passed to the function in the [[Magic Variables#this|_this]] variable

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> code: [[Code]] - [[compile|compiled]] instructions

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Anything]] - The last value given in the function is returned. See the topic [[Function#Return_Values|Function]] for more information.

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[call]] { [[hint]] [[str]] 123; };</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>123 [[call]] { [[hint]] [[str]] _this; };</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_sum = [1, 2] [[call]] { ([[Magic Variables#this|_this]] [[select]] 0) + ([[Magic Variables#this|_this]] [[select]] 1); };
[[hint]] [[str]] _sum; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>displays 3</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>123 [[call]] [[compile]] "[[hint]] [[str]] _this;";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x5</name>=<value> <code>_result = 123 [[call]] [[compile]] [[preprocessFileLineNumbers]] "myFile.sqf";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[spawn]], [[execVM]], [[canSuspend]], [[compile]], [[preprocessFile]], [[remoteExec]], [[remoteExecCall]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
